attributes.action: 50% discount to students on their first car insurance.
attributes.additional_details: Car insurance is too expensive. Some students do part time jobs but still they cannot afford to pay the high amount for insurance.
attributes.background: Car insurance is too expensive. Some students do part time jobs but they cannot afford to pay the high amount for insurance. I want government to give 50% discount to students on their First car insurance.

rejection.details:
The price of car insurance is a decision for the insurance provider and not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition asking for the Government to set a maximum insurance premium for younger drivers, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
